It was the blue scarf wrapped around his neck flying out in the wind as he leapt that tipped you off as too who this crazy boy was. 113.content: Which character will be torturing you?
113.title: Inuyasha

choices: Transform you into an actual cushion!
1131.content:
Shippo is a very mischievous and, unfortunately for you, gassy, fox demon that you would soon have the misfortune of meeting. Getting picked on all the time by Inuyasha really made him want someone of his own to torture and relieve his stress with. Though, you never would have guessed in advance meeting him would be such a bad thing.

You were a fairly normal person that lived a boring, regular life. Your favorite anime was Inuyasha, and sometimes you just wished you could leave your life for a more exciting one like Kagome did. If only you knew what this wish would bring... One day, after yet another uneventful day you lied down to get off to sleep. Once again, you found yourself wishing to go to an exciting world as you fall asleep.

When you awoke, you immediately realized you were somewhere else. Not only were you outside it looked like you were in the middle of nowhere, only trees surrounding you with not a building in sight. You tried to remember what happened but could only recall a very, very strange dream involving a giant... fox butt?! You couldn't remember any of it other than there being a fox butt, how odd... Just as you were about to get up and try and found out just where the hell you were, a kid walked by. Though you soon noticed he wasn't just any ordinary kid, to your disbelief this was Shippo the Kitsune! "H-hello? Shippo?!" You asked in amazement, this could only mean your wish came true!

Shippo turned around as he was sucking on a lollipop that Kagome had given him. "Huh?! How do you know my name? Wait... those clothes... you're from Kagome's world! How did you get here? Unless..." He thought for a moment before he gasped and smirked. "My wish! It must of come true! Finally, I got someone I can mess with! My very own fart cushion!"

"Wish? I made one too, it was to come here, I- wait... fart... cushion?" You gasped as you processed the information. The dream about the fox butt... Shippo's wish... You had been transported here to serve as his fart cushion!

Shippo smiled smugly to himself and nodded. "Yup. I'm sick of Inuyasha picking on me all the time, I want to have some fun for once! And I can't think of anything more fun than farting alllll over someone while they have to smell it. Oh this is going to be awesome!" Before you could even protest, Shippo used his fox magic on you to...

Heh, I do hope you can handle the smell." He grinned and turned around, it seemed he wanted to try out his new toy immediately. 115331.content:
School Babysitters is an anime centered around two brothers, Kotaro and Ryuuichi Kashima. Their parents died in a plane crash and as a result, they are taken in by the chairwoman of Minorimiya Acadamey, who lost her son and daughter in law in the same plane crash that killed Ryuuichi and Kotaro's parents. In exchange for taking them in, Ryuuichi agrees to work at the academy's Babysitter Club. A club created to look after the children of the teachers who teach at the academy. The children here are kids who either attend the club on a daily basis or who have interacted with the main characters.

Now that you know what this anime is, who does the torturing?

Here's a link to the list of characters in case you need it:


http://gakuenbabysitters.wikia.com/wiki/...
115331.title: School Babysitters

choices: The girls want to play a game.

121132.content:
"Have a good night! Enjoy the show!"

You waved goodbye to the woman as she walked away, waiting until she was out of sight, and released a long sigh as you closed the door. Babysitting a bunch of brats wasn't exactly your idea of a fun Saturday. But the pay was good. You walked down the creaky hallway and opened the door to the living room.

Two blue-haired girls were sitting on the couch, watching some cartoon.
"Hey, girls!"
The two of them turned and looked your way. One of them, wearing a yellow shirt with a picture of a Shelder on it, returned your greeting politely and introduced herself as Sarah. Her blue pants and headband reminded you of Lana - they must get their fashion sense from her. The other girl, who must've been Harper, flashed you a smile and waved. She was dressed the same except for her shirt which was pink with a Slowpoke's face on it.

They were happy to chat with you - about their favorite cartoons, what they were doing in school, their friends - but they mostly paid attention to the television.
121132.title: Sarah and Harper

choices: "We are going to have so much fun!" (Gentle)
1211322.content:
Harper suddenly stood up.
"Bathroom," she said flatly and ran off.
"I'll go with you!" Sarah shouted and followed after her, down the dark hallway.

You waited more than 20 minutes but Harper and Sarah still hadn't come back yet. You were a bit worried, so you decided to go check on them.

The hallway was dark and unfortunately the light switch was at the other end. You put your hand on the wall to feel your way down. The bathroom was just around the corner...

Huh?

As you turned the corner you felt your foot catch on something. You throw out your hands looking for anything to grab onto, but there was nothing. You felt yourself tumble forwards, through the darkness, until...

*WHAM!*

You smashed into the ground headfirst. The impact left you dazed, and also feeling pretty stupid. You lie there and waited for your head to clear.
Suddenly you felt a heavy weight on your back. Small hands grabbed your wrists and pulled them behind you.
"What? Who's there!?" you shout. You tried to stand up or wrestle your arms free but you were still dizzy from falling on your face.

*WRRRIIP!*

The tell-tale sound of a roll of duct tape being removed. You felt the cold adhesive wrap around your wrists one, two, three, a dozen times, keeping then firmly and helplessly stuck. The weight shifted and you felt the same being done to your ankles. You started yelling for help but you were interrupted by a soft, sweet-smelling hand covering your mouth and applying another piece of tape across it.

"Shut up, we're almost done."

Two pairs of hands roughly flipped onto your back. You could barely make out a shape in the haze...until, with a *click*, the hallways lights turned on.

Harper? Sarah?
You were dumbfounded. Harper was sitting atop your chest smiling down at you. She was soon joined by Sarah, who ran over from the light switch.

"That was pefect!"
"See, I told you it would work!"
The twins high-fived eachother and laughed. They tricked you! Sarah took a step closer, her hands clasped behind her back.
1211322.title: The girls trick you and ambush you!

choices: "Hold his head, I've got a big one coming!"
Sarah turns it up by pulling down her pants.
12113222.content:
You couldn't believe what you were hearing. You yelled through the tape covering your mouth but they didn't seem to care. The girls began the slow process of shuffling your body through the hallway, dropping you more than once as they went! After a few bruises you finally made it to the living room. You were sitting on the floor propped up against the couch. The girls surrounded you, one on either side.

"So who gets to go first?"
"How about we both go at the same time?"
"Ooh, sounds fun!"
The twins turned around to face away from you and bent forward at the waist. Their blue cotton pants hugged their hips, outlining their small rears, which hung a mere foot or two from your face. You were a little uncomfortable, being this close to their butts.

"Ready, Harper? Three..."
"Two..."
"One..."
"...Zero!"

*Prrrrrnnttttt!*

You heard a short, trumpeting burst, accompanied by a warm wind that blew into your face. The scent of rotting eggs rushed into your nose.
Did they just...fart on me? Oh my god, that's disgusting! They weren't kidding!
The twins doubled over with laughter as you writhed behind them. The tape over your mouth forced you to take in the scent of the fart, which lingered around your head. Harper calmed down long enough to take a small sniff of the air.
"Pee-yew! You stink! Hahahaha!"

"Come on, it was just a little fart. Nothing to cry about."
You mumble a response. With your mouth blocked it didn't matter what you said. Sarah just smiled and patted you on the head condescendingly.
"Well, you better get used to it quick. You're gonna be our fart cushion for the rest of the night!"
The hand patting your head suddenly grabbed a tuft of your hair. Sarah turned around as she pulled you forwards towards her awaiting rear. The side of your face rubbed up against her.
"Stop fighting and starting sniffing, ehehe!"
Sarah laughed as she cut a short squeaker onto your nose. You pulled back, but not before you got a good whiff of it.
Nnnnnngg!!
It was small, but the airy fart still made you cringe. What kind of girl farted like that, and was proud of it?
12113222.title: "Are you ready, fart-sniffer?" (Mean)

choices: She gives you some more while you're down there.
121132221.content:
"Sarah, Sarah! Hold his head, I've got a big one coming!"
Harper (on your left) started backing up towards you butt-first on a crash course for your face. You turned away but Sarah's hands forced you back, making you stare at Harper's oncoming bottom. Closer and closer it got, until finally you felt your nose make contact with the seat of her pants. The soft material pressed up against your nose and you could smell the lingering scent of her earlier fart. But she didn't stop there; Harper continued backing up, sinking your nose in deeper between her cheeks. Every breath brought with it a musty stench.
Finally Harper leaned forward slightly and relaxed...

*PFFBBBTTBTTT!*

...slamming a great bubbly blast right up your nose!
"Ugh, warn me next time, Harper."
Sarah coughed and held her nose as Harper giggled. To your dismay she didn't let up like before. Instead she remained in place, pushing you against the couch and keeping your face pressed up against her rear end. You were stuck in a cloud of Harper's gas, not able to even turn away as you unwilling sniffed up the tainted air. She put more weight onto you, your nose rubbing up against something...
121132221.title: "Hold his head, I've got a big one comi...

info.brief_description: Little kids from different anime series fart on other characters or you. 200 GP per add.
info.description:
You have been transported to your favorite anime world as a character. However, you've been discovered by one of the kids from that anime and are forced to be their personal fart cushion.

Disclaimer: I DO NOT own any anime in this interactive.

Rules:
1. No sex.
2. No nudity. (Bare butt is allowed, but no genitals.)
3. The characters are allowed to shrink one another.
4. Four sentence MINIMUM.
5. No death.
6. Have a blast! (Terrible and obvious pun intended.)
